title: mshzhb
author: mshzhb
content: Hi,VKminer Version 0.1 for Windows, Linux, Mac and Android is available.0% dev fee!This eth/etc miner supports nvidia, amd, intel, adreno, mali, img and apple M1 GPUs. It also the first miner available on android.VKminer is the first an Etcash GPU mining worker based on Vulkan: with the miner you can mine every coin which relies on an Etcash/Ethash Proof of Work thus including Ethereum (deprecated), Ethereum Classic, Metaverse, Musicoin, Ellaism, Pirl, Expanse and others. This is the actively maintained version of Vulkan-ethminer.This project is still under development. If you want to join the team and commint to this project, please contact: mshzhb@gmail.comMain Page: https://github.com/mshzhb/vk-ethminerDownload: Â https://github.com/mshzhb/vk-ethminer/releasesHave Fun!Thanks,mshzhb

comments.author: Flep182
comments.body: Is there a compiled file to install on apple by any chance?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Etcash/Ethash is an algorithm for ASICs, so video cards on it will not give a profit.v0.1 released Jan 10 and there were no updates during that time. I haven't heard about this miner so check the information first because the downloads were changed last month.
